page.title: 03WARWICKSLAND C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: Warwicksland is on of Cumbria C.C's NE Division,small,remote area schools. Children from 4 plus to 11 plus.Catchment radius of 9km.Kershope foot in N,Lad's Lodge to E,Scuggate to S and Peter's Crook to W.We are on the Scottish Border. School has a staff of a headteacher,a part-time infant teacher,a cook,a cleaner and a mid-day supervisor.There is a travelling nursery service linked to us for two sessions.Curriculum aimed to suit needs of all covering all aspects of language,maths,the arts and crafts,scientific nad social studies,physical and religious education.Visits and joint ventures with other small rural schools are arranged.The Library Service visit us.A School Association gives us support for educational visits.Visitors welcomed into school.
